Load assessments from a package/directory

Source: R/util-MakeAssessmentList.R
MakeAssessmentList.Rd

Load assessments from a package/directory

MakeAssessmentList(path = "assessments", package = "gsm")

Arguments

path

character The location of assessment YAML files. If package is specified, function will look in /inst folder.

package

character package with assessments

Value

list A list of assessments with workflow and parameter metadata.

Details

MakeAssessmentList() is a utility function that creates a workflow mapping for assessments used in Study_Assess().

Examples

MakeAssessmentList(path = "assessments", package = "gsm")
#> $ae
#> $ae$label
#> [1] "Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events"
#> 
#> $ae$tags
#> $ae$tags$Assessment
#> [1] "Safety"
#> 
#> $ae$tags$Label
#> [1] "AEs"
#> 
#> 
#> $ae$workflow
#> $ae$workflow[[1]]
#> $ae$workflow[[1]]$name
#> [1] "FilterDomain"
#> 
#> $ae$workflow[[1]]$inputs
#> [1] "dfAE"
#> 
#> $ae$workflow[[1]]$output
#> [1] "dfAE"
#> 
#> $ae$workflow[[1]]$params
#> $ae$workflow[[1]]$params$strDomain
#> [1] "dfAE"
#> 
#> $ae$workflow[[1]]$params$strColParam
#> [1] "strTreatmentEmergentCol"
#> 
#> $ae$workflow[[1]]$params$strValParam
#> [1] "strTreatmentEmergentVal"
#> 
#> 
#> 
#> $ae$workflow[[2]]
#> $ae$workflow[[2]]$name
#> [1] "AE_Map_Raw"
#> 
#> $ae$workflow[[2]]$inputs
#> [1] "dfAE"   "dfSUBJ"
#> 
#> $ae$workflow[[2]]$output
#> [1] "dfInput"
#> 
#> 
#> $ae$workflow[[3]]
#> $ae$workflow[[3]]$name
#> [1] "AE_Assess"
#> 
#> $ae$workflow[[3]]$inputs
#> [1] "dfInput"
#> 
#> $ae$workflow[[3]]$output
#> [1] "lResults"
#> 
#> $ae$workflow[[3]]$params
#> $ae$workflow[[3]]$params$strMethod
#> [1] "poisson"
#> 
#> 
#> 
#> 
#> $ae$path
#> [1] "/home/runner/work/_temp/Library/gsm/assessments/ae.yaml"
#> 
#> $ae$name
#> [1] "ae"
#>
